author: wddgit
body:
#### PR description:

The first commit includes only changes from scram build code-format-all and nothing else. This PR includes all the packages in the IOPool subsystem.

There were a few addition changes that showed up in code-checks in the second commit.

#### PR validation:

The only test I performed was checking that the revised packages compile and build.
title: Changes from scram build format-all on IOPool
